pages.text: The $(item)Hellfire Forge$() is one of the core crafting mechanics of $(6)Blood Magic$(), alongside the $(l:altar/blood_altar)Blood Altar$(/l) itself. Here, you can work with the $(l:demon_will/demon_will)$(item)Demon Will$() you have harvested from mobs, to allow you to create $(l:demon_will/sentient_tools)$(item)Sentient Tools$(), including the $(l:demon_will/sentient_sword)$(item)Sentient Sword$(), $(l:demon_will/soul_gem)$(item)Tartaric Gems$(), various $(item)reagents$(), $(l:alchemy_array/arcane_ash)Arcane Ash$(), and many things besides.
